com.revolsys.io.xml
Class StaxXmlWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.revolsys.io.xml.StaxXmlWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter
public class StaxXmlWriter
extends Object
implements javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter

The StaxXmlWriter is a wrapper around an XmlWriter that implements the XMLStreamWriter interface from the StAX API.

Author:
Paul Austin

public StaxXmlWriter(XmlWriter writer)
Parameters:
writer -
Method Detail

close

public void close()
           throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException

Close this writer and free any resources associated with the writer. Note: this underlying writer closes the stream so this method breaks from the StAX specification which says it must not close te underlying output stream.

Specified by:
close in interface javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter
Throws:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - If an exception writing the XML occurs.

           throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException

writeCData

public void writeCData(String text)
                throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
Write the contents in a CDATA section. No escaping will be done on the data the text must not contain "]]>".

Specified by:
writeCData in interface javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter
Parameters:
text - The text to wrap in a CDATA section
Throws:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - If there was a problem writing the text

public void writeDTD(String dtd)
              throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
Write a DTD section. This string represents the entire doctypedecl production from the XML 1.0 specification.
